feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Bicycle(Bicycle) :m Frame(Frame) :g [1,1] : Iron(Iron) : Aluminum(Aluminum) : Carbon(Carbon) :g [1,1] : White(White) : Red(Red) : Black(Black) :o Gears(Gears) :o Front(Front) :o Rear(Rear) :m Wheels(Wheels) :m Saddle(Saddle) :m Color(Color) :g [1,1] : _r_15_16_17(_r_15_16_17) : Green(Green) : Blue(Blue) :m Handlebars(Handlebars) :o Pedals(Pedals) :o Warranty(Warranty) :g [1,1] : a1year(a1year) : a2years(a2years) : a3years(a3years) :o Maintenanceplan(Maintenanceplan) :g [1,1] : _r_29_30_31(_r_29_30_31) : _r_29_30_32(_r_29_30_32) : lifetime(lifetime)
